name: Euro Champions Soccer Striker
description:
Euro Champions Soccer Striker will test your dribbling, technique, reflexes, speed, shot and goal, everything a football (soccer for Americans) player needs to excel at the beautiful game. Play like Messi, unlock as many soccer balls as possible and you will sure be hooked in a unique kind of soccer game.

Simply tap the screen to dribble your way to victory.
Features of Euro Champions Soccer Striker:

- Gamecenter Leaderboard
- Addictive gameplay
- Score Goals
- Endless gameplay
- Unlock soccer balls
